MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the KA10 Postcode area of Troon. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers are on site and in order to complete a repair due to a fault on our underground cable network, we now need to carry out an emergency shutdown. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.48PM 2nd March 2021.
